page.title: 19GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: {DIPS }You do a dip at the beginning of a game to see who is 'it'. This is one.{Eeny menie macka racka rear rye {domanacka chicka pocka lolly popper {pom pom push. Here is another.{Ible Oble,Black {Bobble,Ible Oble Out,Turn the dirty {dish cloth inside out,You are not it. {GAMES Holly on the Hob.} The person who is 'it' counts to 50 while the other people hide.When the person has counted he or she runs and tries to tig them.If you are being chased try and run to tig the{Hob which can be a tree or something else. If you get tigged you will be 'it' next time but if the person doesn't tig anybody they are 'it' again next time. {Red,Amber,Green.}Someone shouts red, amber, green and we all do handstands. The person who stays up longest wins.
